reviewComments: Once you find the parking area, it is a very short walk to where the "Falls" had worn through the volcanic rock to form worn pot-holes and swirls over thousands of years by waters... read more
Took some friends to visit the Falls - we all thought that it was a great place to visit. Not sure how someone pushing a stroller/wheelchair would be able to navigate the path.
Stopped here after the long drive, and dangerous- people are nutty from the heat and drive this stretch of road like lunatics like passing on double sold lines on a hill... read more
